data.title: Williamsburg, Brooklyn Hotel with Rooftop Pool and Bar
data.meta_description: Arlo Williamsburg, formerly known as The Williamsburg Hotel, offers rooms with skyline views, event venues, and rooftop pool and bar.
data.text:
Arlo Williamsburg, formerly The Williamsburg Hotel, home of the iconic Water Tower Bar

Dynamic, vibrant and at the vanguard of what’s next—Arlo Williamsburg, like the Brooklyn neighborhood we call home, is your launchpad for innovative urban exploration in NYC. Our smartly appointed rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Brooklyn and Manhattan. Don’t miss ART Williamsburg, Brooklyn’s premier rooftop pool deck and bar when you need to hit pause on all that go, go, go.

Formerly The Williamsburg Hotel

Exciting News! The Williamsburg Hotel has undergone a fabulous transformation and is now proudly rebranded as the Arlo Williamsburg. Joining our family of three other iconic NYC properties, guests can still expect the same incredible experience, with the added bonus of extended Arlo perks. Get ready to immerse yourself in the heart of Williamsburg’s vibrant scene at the newly minted Arlo Williamsburg!

Groups & Events

Arlo Williamsburg is at the heart of our bustling community of creatives and doers, perfect for meeting with colleagues to make what’s next happen, or for gathering with friends and family to party down. From our 6,500-square foot ballroom, our restaurant and bar spaces, to ART Williamsburg, our unrivaled rooftop pool deck with sweeping views across NYC—oh, and our seamless service and top-notch food and drinks—Arlo Williamsburg has your next event space covered.

Come see what all the fuss is about. Our neighborhood’s bars, restaurants, galleries, boutiques, street scene, parks and nightlife pulse with Brooklyn’s irrepressible energy. At Arlo Williamsburg, NYC’s most dynamic neighborhood is at your feet. We’ll be here when you return to recharge.
